caption:
This photograph captures a group of men at an outdoor event, dominated by the striking image of a man in the foreground who is wearing a bright red hat and a salmon-pink polo shirt. This central figure has a confident smile and stands with his arms crossed, exuding a relaxed demeanor. He also wears dark trousers, a black belt, and a wristwatch. 

The red hat he wears is unique and ornamental, featuring a small badge or pin on the band. The background features several other men, illustrating a variety of expressions and attire. One man directly behind the central figure wears a pale fedora and a light-colored short-sleeved shirt, while another to the right wears a camouflage bucket hat and sunglasses, contributing to the casual and diverse nature of the gathering. The background is softly out of focus, highlighting a natural setting with faint suggestions of greenery, which suggests the setting might be a park or outdoor recreational area. The overall mood is festive and relaxed, indicative of a social or community gathering.
title: Norman s.  Kilgore, a miner attending the Tennessee consolidated coal company first annual picnic at a Tennessee valley authority lake near jasper and Chattanooga, Tennessee.  A safety man and roof bolter in mine #21, he started in the mines as a mule driver when he was nine years old, and has worked underground off and on for 20 years
